title: System Performance & Login Issues
description: Troubleshooting slow systems, login problems, and application crashes.

steps.title: Restart System
steps.instruction: Perform a full restart of your system to clear temporary issues.

steps.title: Check Connectivity
steps.instruction: Ensure your internet/network connection is stable.

steps.title: App Reset
steps.instruction: Logout and log back in. Close and reopen the problematic application.

steps.title: Resource Management
steps.instruction: End unnecessary background applications to free up system resources.

steps.title: Verification
steps.instruction: If the issue persists or multiple users are affected, raise an IT ticket. Do not install unauthorized software.
